ext.configuration.title: php use
ext.configuration.showUnusedImportsDiagn: Show diagnostics warnings for unused imports
ext.configuration.diagnosticSeverity: Diagnostic severity level for unused imports
ext.configuration.showNotifications: Show notification messages when performing extension actions
ext.configuration.exclude: Glob patterns for files and folders to exclude from search
ext.configuration.autoSortAfterImports: Automatically sort namespace imports after adding new imports (default: alphabetically)
ext.configuration.naturalSort: Sort imports using natural order algorithm (e.g., Item 2 comes before Item 10)
